metadata.synopsis: The party reacts to spotting a special tadpole in one of the brine pools of the Colony Tadpoling Centre. It can be used for the tadpole powers tree.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the brine pools at the back of the Colony Tadpoling Centre: "oe tc_brine" or "goto 687 18 41"- Enable "roll amazing", and interact with the brine pool on the right-hand side.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: An unusual parasite, here. It's - it's reaching out to me.
